name: IRT - Interactive Response Technologies Europe 2025
description: The IRT - Interactive Response Technologies Europe event brings the presentation introduces the fundamentals of GS1® data structure and standards. It further explains how these standards were utilized in a proof-of-concept pilot to demonstrate how GS1® standards are additive to supply optimization efforts. The pilot was initiated by the Clinical Supply Leadership Forum (CSLF) GS1® community of practice, led by Asim Kahn from Amgen and Hans von Steiger from Pfizer. During this pilot, the feasibility of streamlining site receiving and dispensing operations through connection of systems was demonstrated. Through collaboration, the pilot showcased how key aspects of clinical supply distribution and dispensing can be streamlined by leveraging GS1 identification and electronic data interchange (EDI) standards.

name: Travel Leaders Forum
description: The Travel Leaders Forum is a premier event tailored for travel industry professionals held in Sydney, Australia, organized by Connect Media. It focuses on actionable insights and real-world solutions by bringing together the leading voices shaping the sector. This forum addresses the rapidly evolving landscape influenced by geopolitical disruptions, emerging technologies, and shifting consumer expectations, which present complex strategic decisions for travel leaders. With the aim of redefining businesses for the next decade, the event serves as a catalyst for sustainable travel growth, providing attendees with essential tools, skills, and connections necessary for maximizing consumer engagement and building high-growth partnerships.The Forum is specifically designed for Australia's leading industry experts and decision-makers, ensuring that every conversation and connection delivers impactful value. Attendees will hear from industry-leading experts who will share transformative innovations and solutions relevant to the future of travel. The carefully curated content, produced with the support of Connect Media's vast network of industry specialists, addresses leading challenges and fosters innovation in the sector. Participants will leave equipped with the knowledge necessary to tackle tomorrow's pressing issues. The event also emphasizes the importance of networking, allowing attendees to build valuable connections with C-Suite leaders, VPs, and other key figures who are actively transforming the industry. To accommodate different attendees, there are various registration types available, including passes for in-house travel professionals as well as vendors and consultants. Each delegate pass includes access to sessions, refreshment breaks, and networking lunches, with strict policies in place regarding ticket sharing and entry requirements.

name: 2026 World of Industry, Technology & Science
description: The World of Industry, Technology & Science (WoTS) is a biennial technology trade fair that brings together professionals, students, scientists, and tech enthusiasts to explore innovations and developments. Attendees can engage with exhibits, vote for the High Tech Trophy, and learn about cutting-edge products and services.
industryGroupsConcatString: Other Information Technology, Pharmaceuticals and Biotechnology
